name: Situation TARFU (CrazyLegends Studios)
description:
Situation TARFU is a simple get to the top arcade game with 3 playable characters (at release)

  • TheXMan: He's well rounded!
  • M: She's faster than the others but doesn't jump as high! 
  • Mustache Guy: He jumps higher than everyone but runs slowly! 

That's not all this game will be receiving free updates adding new characters, modes and more!
